DO_PRST_SQL_VAL_EXPR.Value: UPDATE GT_MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF FROM GT_MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF SET SYS_ERR_CODE = (COALESCE( GT_MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF.SYS_ERR_CODE,'') ||';COMBINATION OF LEGAL_ENT_NBR,TRT_NBR ALREADY EXISTS') , SYS_ERR_SVRTY = 'SEVERE_ERROR' WHERE EXISTS (SELECT LEGAL_ENT_NBR,TRT_NBR FROM MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF T3 WHERE GT_MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF.LEGAL_ENT_NBR=T3.LEGAL_ENT_NBR AND GT_MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF.TRT_NBR=T3.TRT_NBR )

DO_PRST_SRC_DB_EXPR.Value: UPDATE NC_MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF FROM NC_MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF SET SYS_ERR_CODE = (COALESCE( NC_MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF.SYS_ERR_CODE,'') ||';COMBINATION OF LEGAL_ENT_NBR,TRT_NBR ALREADY EXISTS') , SYS_ERR_SVRTY = 'SEVERE_ERROR' WHERE EXISTS (SELECT LEGAL_ENT_NBR,TRT_NBR FROM MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF T3 WHERE NC_MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF.LEGAL_ENT_NBR=T3.LEGAL_ENT_NBR AND NC_MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF.TRT_NBR=T3.TRT_NBR )

P_RULE_EXPR_1.Value: update T1 from MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF T1 SET SYS_ERR_CODE = (COALESCE(T1.SYS_ERR_CODE,'') ||';COMBINATION OF LEGAL_ENT_NBR,TRT_NBR ALREADY EXISTS') , SYS_ERR_SVRTY = 'SEVERE_ERROR' where EXISTS (SELECT LEGAL_ENT_NBR,TRT_NBR FROM MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF T3 WHERE T1.LEGAL_ENT_NBR=T3.LEGAL_ENT_NBR AND T1.TRT_NBR=T3.TRT_NBR ))

RULE_EXPR.Value: <sql_validation ErrorCode="COMBINATION OF LEGAL_ENT_NBR,TRT_NBR ALREADY EXISTS" ErrorSeverity="SEVERE_ERROR" Service="BCM_MASTER" Document="MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF"> <actionType> <Insert Value="true"/> </actionType> <fromCtx> <property Service="BCM_MASTER" Document="MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF"/> </fromCtx> <searchCtx> <queryLinks/> <where> <custom>EXISTS (SELECT LEGAL_ENT_NBR,TRT_NBR FROM MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF T3 WHERE T1.LEGAL_ENT_NBR=T3.LEGAL_ENT_NBR AND T1.TRT_NBR=T3.TRT_NBR ))</custom> </where> </searchCtx> </sql_validation>

RULE_NAME.Value: Uniqueness Check for LEGAL_ENT_NBR and TRT_NBR

DO_PRST_SQL_VAL_EXPR.Value: UPDATE GT_MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF FROM GT_MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF SET SYS_ERR_CODE = (COALESCE( GT_MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF.SYS_ERR_CODE,'') ||';MKTNG_PGM_NBR or DATA_SRCE_NBR is populated then other field should be populated') , SYS_ERR_SVRTY = 'SEVERE_ERROR' WHERE (GT_MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF.MKTNG_PGM_NBR IS NOT NULL AND GT_MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF. DATA_SRCE_NBR IS NULL) OR (GT_MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF.DATA_SRCE_NBR IS NOT NULL AND GT_MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF. MKTNG_PGM_NBR IS NULL)

DO_PRST_SRC_DB_EXPR.Value: UPDATE NC_MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF FROM NC_MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF SET SYS_ERR_CODE = (COALESCE( NC_MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF.SYS_ERR_CODE,'') ||';MKTNG_PGM_NBR or DATA_SRCE_NBR is populated then other field should be populated') , SYS_ERR_SVRTY = 'SEVERE_ERROR' WHERE (GT_MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF.MKTNG_PGM_NBR IS NOT NULL AND GT_MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF. DATA_SRCE_NBR IS NULL) OR (GT_MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF.DATA_SRCE_NBR IS NOT NULL AND GT_MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF. MKTNG_PGM_NBR IS NULL)

P_RULE_EXPR_1.Value: update T1 from MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF T1 SET SYS_ERR_CODE = (COALESCE(T1.SYS_ERR_CODE,'') ||';MKTNG_PGM_NBR or DATA_SRCE_NBR is populated then other field should be populated') , SYS_ERR_SVRTY = 'SEVERE_ERROR' where (T1.MKTNG_PGM_NBR IS NOT NULL AND T1. DATA_SRCE_NBR IS NULL) OR (T1.DATA_SRCE_NBR IS NOT NULL AND T1. MKTNG_PGM_NBR IS NULL)

RULE_EXPR.Value: <sql_validation ErrorCode="MKTNG_PGM_NBR or DATA_SRCE_NBR is populated then other field should be populated" ErrorSeverity="SEVERE_ERROR" Service="BCM_MASTER" Document="MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF"> <actionType> <Insert Value="true"/> </actionType> <actionType> <Update Value="true"/> </actionType> <fromCtx> <property Service="BCM_MASTER" Document="MATCHD_CNSMR_TRT_REF"/> </fromCtx> <searchCtx> <queryLinks/> <where> <custom>(T1.MKTNG_PGM_NBR IS NOT NULL AND T1. DATA_SRCE_NBR IS NULL) OR (T1.DATA_SRCE_NBR IS NOT NULL AND T1. MKTNG_PGM_NBR IS NULL))</custom> </where> </searchCtx> </sql_validation>

DO_PRST_SQL_VAL_EXPR.Value: UPDATE GT_CNSMR_SCORE_REF FROM GT_CNSMR_SCORE_REF SET SYS_ERR_CODE = (COALESCE( GT_CNSMR_SCORE_REF .SYS_ERR_CODE,'') ||';Value for HIST_RETEN_DAYS field is required') , SYS_ERR_SVRTY = 'SEVERE_ERROR' WHERE (GT_CNSMR_SCORE_REF .HIST_RETEN_DAYS IS NULL)

DO_PRST_SRC_DB_EXPR.Value: UPDATE NC_CNSMR_SCORE_REF FROM NC_CNSMR_SCORE_REF SET SYS_ERR_CODE = (COALESCE( NC_CNSMR_SCORE_REF .SYS_ERR_CODE,'') ||';Value for HIST_RETEN_DAYS field is required') , SYS_ERR_SVRTY = 'SEVERE_ERROR' WHERE (GT_CNSMR_SCORE_REF .HIST_RETEN_DAYS IS NULL)

P_RULE_EXPR_1.Value: update T1 from CNSMR_SCORE_REF T1 SET SYS_ERR_CODE = (COALESCE(T1.SYS_ERR_CODE,'') ||';Value for HIST_RETEN_DAYS field is required') , SYS_ERR_SVRTY = 'SEVERE_ERROR' where (T1.HIST_RETEN_DAYS IS NULL)

RULE_EXPR.Value: <sql_validation ErrorCode="Value for HIST_RETEN_DAYS field is required" ErrorSeverity="SEVERE_ERROR" Service="BCM_MASTER" Document="CNSMR_SCORE_REF "> <actionType> <Insert Value="true"/> </actionType> <actionType> <Update Value="true"/> </actionType> <fromCtx> <property Service="BCM_MASTER" Document="CNSMR_SCORE_REF "/> </fromCtx> <searchCtx> <queryLinks/> <where> <custom>(T1.HIST_RETEN_DAYS IS NULL))</custom> </where> </searchCtx> </sql_validation>
